summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hotel Staff Roster Generator NEW features. Backend APIs working at 100% success rate with all new scheduling constraints properly implemented. Frontend UI fully functional with all core features working including position ordering, week/month view toggle, color editing, and roster generation. Fixed name column width issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Name column width not properly applied (48px instead of 280px)
ui_bugs.status: FIXED - Added !important and explicit width to CSS

passed_tests: Position order in sidebar: AGSM → GSC → GSA → Welcome Agent (CORRECT)
Position order in roster table matches sidebar order (CORRECT)
Week/Month view toggle works perfectly
Week view shows exactly 7 days (not more)
Week navigation (prev/next) buttons work correctly
Color legend items are clickable and open color editor
Color edit dialog opens with background and text color pickers
Generate roster works in both month and week views
Export Excel button is enabled when roster exists
Night shifts (23) appear in consecutive blocks as required
Days off (0) appear in consecutive pairs as required
Employee management (add, delete, display) works correctly
Cell editing functionality works (dialog opens, shift selection works)
Business logic constraints properly implemented (5 consecutive nights, 2 days off)
Color coding verification (Night=blue, Days off=pink, Morning=red, Afternoon=green)
Backend position sorting works correctly
Week view roster generation returns proper day count
All CRUD operations on employees work
Roster generation with new scheduling algorithm works
Excel export functionality restored and working
